location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:101 x 132 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘32’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of Kut. A large group of people can be seen at right and centre along the shoreline and in the background, with smaller groups of people at left. Low-lying buildings and at least one minaret are visible in the background.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'Kut.'Pencil, above image at right: ‘32’; ‘10’
